survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Autonomous Vehicle Rides
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced rides in autonomous vehicles to assess satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and understand user expectations.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your recent autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced to capture genuine sentiment.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options to minimize bias.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your recent autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question allows respondents to highlight multiple positives. Include an 'Other' option for unexpected feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes. Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any concerns or issues you encountered during your autonomous vehicle ride.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Useful for identifying unexpected problems.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text. Ensure the input box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any concerns or issues you encountered during your autonomous vehicle ride.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle service again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure future usage intent. Critical for assessing customer retention.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options if needed.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle service again in the future?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to choose autonomous vehicle rides over traditional rides?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Unlikely' or 'Very unlikely' in Q4
questions.client_notes: Targeted open-ended question to gather constructive feedback from less satisfied users.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text. Display only if Q4 response is 'Unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'.

script.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to choose autonomous vehicle rides over traditional rides?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Unlikely' or 'Very unlikely' in Q4
